title: The Dead Cycle - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Clever Protagonist   Doting Love Interests   Female Protagonist   First-time Interc**rse   Handsome Male Lead   Mystery Solving   Reincarnation   Transmigration
author: Ban Li Zi   Chestnut   板栗子
description:
Yin Yin: the female antagonist of “All for Prosperity”, has all the madness a villainess should have. She takes destroying the relationship between the Male and Female Lead as her own personal responsibility. Her method’s are clumsy and was finally blackmailed by the Male Lead.

Lin Xin’er commented: She needs IQ.

So she was transmigrated.

Du Qianqian: the heroine of “All for Prosperity”, is a white lotus flower whose IQ is more worrying than the villainess. She jumps off a cliff and died under persecution.

Lin Xin’er commented: She deserves it.

So she was reborn.

Lin Xin’er: the reader of “All for Prosperity”, is a 21st century leftover woman. Her major hobby in life is cheating people – even making it as her own career. She transmigrated into the novel and became Yin Yin.

—— Life, perhaps, was just a game of chess with exquisite layout. But this time the players have changed.>
